changeWarnings.available: The book will be marked as if it was just returned and confirmed to be available.
changeWarnings.notAvailable: The book will be marked as if it was just returned and confirmed to be not available.
changeWarnings.rented: The book will be marked as if it was just rented by the selected user.
changeWarnings.backSoon: The book will be marked as if it was just returned by the previous renter and will be waiting for the confirmation.
